const additionalStyles="\n  @keyframes spin {\n    0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }\n    100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }\n  }\n\n  .reportItem:hover {\n    border-color: #007bff;\n    background-color: #f8f9fa;\n  }\n\n  .statusButton:hover {\n    border-color: #007bff;\n    background-color: #f0f8ff;\n  }\n\n  .evidenceItem:hover {\n    background-color: #e9ecef;\n    border-color: #007bff;\n  }\n\n  .logoutButton:hover {\n    background-color: #c82333;\n  }\n\n  .refreshButton:hover {\n    background-color: #218838;\n  }\n\n  .mobileCloseButton:hover {\n    background-color: #5a6268;\n  }\n\n  /* Mobile-first responsive design */\n  @media (min-width: 768px) {\n    .header {\n      flex-direction: row;\n      justify-content: space-between;\n      align-items: center;\n      text-align: left;\n    }\n    \n    .headerContent {\n      text-align: left;\n    }\n    \n    .headerActions {\n      justify-content: flex-end;\n    }\n    \n    .statsGrid {\n      grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);\n    }\n    \n    .reportHeader {\n      flex-direction: row;\n    }\n    \n    .detailGrid {\n      grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);\n    }\n    \n    .statusButtons {\n      flex-direction: row;\n    }\n    \n    .mobileCloseSection {\n      display: none;\n    }\n  }\n\n  @media (min-width: 1024px) {\n    .container {\n      padding: '2rem';\n    }\n    \n    .reportsSection {\n      padding: '1.5rem';\n    }\n    \n    .reportItem {\n      padding: '1.25rem';\n    }\n    \n    .statCard {\n      padding: '1.5rem';\n    }\n  }\n\n  @media (max-width: 480px) {\n    .headerActions {\n      flex-direction: column;\n      width: 100%;\n    }\n    \n    .refreshButton,\n    .logoutButton {\n      width: 100%;\n    }\n    \n    .statsGrid {\n      grid-template-columns: 1fr;\n    }\n    \n    .statusButtons {\n      flex-direction: column;\n    }\n    \n    .statusButton {\n      min-width: auto;\n    }\n    \n    .evidenceItem {\n      flex-direction: column;\n      text-align: center;\n      gap: 0.5rem;\n    }\n    \n    .evidenceText {\n      text-align: center;\n    }\n  }\n\n  @media (max-width: 360px) {\n    .container {\n      padding: '0.5rem';\n    }\n    \n    .header,\n    .reportsSection {\n      padding: '1rem';\n    }\n    \n    .reportItem {\n      padding: '0.75rem';\n    }\n    \n    .reportDetails {\n      padding: '1rem';\n    }\n    \n    .statCard {\n      padding: '1rem';\n    }\n  }\n";// Inject styles
if(typeof document!=='undefined'){const style=document.createElement('style');style.textContent=additionalStyles;document.head.appendChild(style);}export default Admin;
